verse.name: v1
verse.lines: (Jongeeni mezani kwa Bwana tule mwili na damu yake) X2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: (Mwili na damu ya Bwana Yesu vitupatie ule uzima , uzima (uzima , uzima) wa milele)X2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1.Mwili wake Yesu pia damu yake vitayari tushiriki.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2. Mwili pia damu yake Bwana Yesu vitupe uzima.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3. Ee Bwana Yesu mimi ni mdhambi nisafishe kwa damuyo.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 4. Ee Yesu njoo ndani yangu nikumbushe kukupenda.
